items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product recommendations per user session
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
dependencies: User data collection and storage module
non_functional: System scales to handle 1 million concurrent users
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: User requirement was vague; assumed need for real-time personalized recommendations using AI/ML models with measurable accuracy and performance targets.
